    <metadata>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Povezovanje parov slik</string>
            <string language="en">Connecting images</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anschließende Bilder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Images se reliantes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Imagens conectando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Immagini di collegamento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συνδέοντας εικόνες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Imágenes que conectan</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Didaktično igro povezovanja parov lahko uporabiš kot motivacijsko igro za pogovor o elektriki, o nevarnostih elektrike, uporabna je kot izdelek v 7.razredu pri Tehniki in tehnologiji, področje elektrika.</string>
            <string language="en">Didactical game to teach about electricity, circuits, danger present, ...</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">igra</string>
            <string language="en">game</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">žarnica</string>
            <string language="en">electric bulb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">tokokrog</string>
            <string language="en">circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">slika</string>
            <string language="en">image</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Über Elektrizität, Stromkreise zu 
unterrichtendes Didactical Spiel, Gefahr vorhanden...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu de Didactical à enseigner au sujet de 
l'électricité, circuits, danger actuel...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogo de Didactical a ensinar sobre a 
eletricidade, circuitos, perigo atual...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gioco di Didactical da insegnare circa 
elettricità, circuiti, pericolo presente...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διδακτικό παιχνίδι που διδάσκει για την ηλεκτρική 
ενέργεια, κυκλώματα, κίνδυνος παρών...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Juego de Didactical a enseñar sobre la 
electricidad, circuitos, peligro presente...</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Birne</string>
          </keyword>
